mapper.insert:
replace into tb_site_message(id, sender_id, receiver_id, entity, entity_type, event, notice_type, create_time, is_read) values
(#{message.id}, #{message.senderId}, #{message.receiverId}, #{message.entity}, #{message.entityType}, #{message.event} , #{message.noticeType}, #{message.createTime} , #{message.isRead})
mapper.select: select id, sender_id, receiver_id, entity, entity_type, event, notice_type, create_time, is_read from tb_site_message tsm where tsm.receiver_id = #{id} order by create_time desc
select id, sender_id, receiver_id, entity, entity_type, event, notice_type, create_time, is_read from tb_site_message where receiver_id = #{id} and is_read = 0 order by create_time desc
